channel.title: git on Cup of Tegan
channel.description: Recent content in git on Cup of Tegan

item.title: Remove incomplete commit locks on the command line
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Run these commands in the command line to clear incomplete commits: rm .git/COMMIT_EDITMSG rm .git/.COMMIT_EDITMSG.swp rm .git/index.lock Then add your changes, commit and push as you would normally.

item.title: Remove node_modules from Git repository
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Run this command to remove node_modules files from your local repository git rm -r --cached node_modules Run this command to add node_modules to your .gitignore echo "node_modules" >> .gitignore

item.title: Remove .DS_Store from Git repository
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Run this command to remove .DS_Store files from your repository find . -name .DS_Store -print0 | xargs -0 git rm --ignore-unmatch Run this command to add .DS_Store to your .gitignore echo ."DS_Store" >> .gitignore
